primary_factors.explanation: The candidate has 2+ years of relevant experience in costing and financial analysis, which aligns well with the job requirements.
The current title of Sr. Executive-Costing is relevant but not directly aligned with the title of Pricing Associate.
The candidate has performed various relevant responsibilities such as cost analysis, budgeting, and MIS reporting, which are crucial for the role.
The resume indicates good communication skills, but there is no specific evidence of email writing skills.
The candidate has shown a willingness to learn new skills, as evidenced by their involvement in SAP S/4 HANA implementation and MIS automation.
The candidate has had multiple roles in a relatively short period, indicating moderate stability.
The candidate has adapted to different roles and responsibilities, showing a good level of adaptability.
The candidate has shown growth in their career, moving from a trainee to a Sr. Executive role.
The candidate has worked with reputable organizations like Zydus Lifesciences and Tata Autocomp.

secondary_factors.explanation: The candidate has experience in the pharmaceutical and manufacturing industries, which are relevant to the job.
The candidate has a professional qualification (CMA) and an M.Com degree, which are highly relevant to the job.
The candidate has experience with MS Office and SAP, which are relevant tools for the job.
The candidate is proficient in English, Hindi, and Gujarati, which is beneficial for communication.
